name: Desert Dye
flavorText: Sandy brown pigment is carried by the merchant caravans of the Dry Steppes to reflect the sun and hide dust.
flavorTextHtml: Sandy brown pigment is carried by the merchant caravans of the Dry Steppes to reflect the sun and hide dust.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
